comments.body: As far as I can see there are only lists of size 0 or 1.

That's to support multiple `@usecase`. See the commit messages of https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/4789/commits/c528d6ae0a552df29ce2aa131114375d0d60079b and https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/4789/commits/f1da1e155f58818615e412ea9330148ee3f3b0bc

This is where longer lists may be created: https://github.com/lampepfl/dotty/pull/4789/files#diff-5a9874880800484ed4b082c8d776c661R30
I would do `o.name.stripModuleClassSuffix.toString`. `show` is for pretty printing, it might add colors

I don't think show adds color on names, but if we change this then there's a ton of places where this is used in dottydoc that need to be changed. I'll leave that to whoever wants to maintain dottydoc :).
